subject: SWT unit testing
msgSnippet: I ve been attempting to TDD SWT.  So far its been very difficult. Not happy with Abbot for SWT as it injects events at the operating system level, forcing the
messageBody:
I've been attempting to TDD SWT. So far its been very difficult.
Not happy with Abbot for SWT as it injects events at the operating
system level, forcing the SWT being tested to have focus at the
operating level (painful when Eclipse grabs focus back on test
failure). Has anybody out there managed to create a mock Display or
mock shell objects? Is PDEUnit worth trying to use? I did not want
to go and make plugins when all I want to do is to make sure a
Composite is functioning properly.
